Genre:

Tagline:
What If You Had A Universal Remote... That Controlled Your Universe?
Plot Outline:
"Click" focuses on a workaholic architect who finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life. Complications arise when the remote starts to overrule his choices. Runtime:
107 min 
Language:
English
